metadata.title: CVE-2016-10539 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: negotiator is an HTTP content negotiator for Node.js and is used by manymodules and frameworks including Express and Koa. The header for"Accept-Language", when parsed by negotiator 0.6.0 and earlier isvulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service via a specially craftedstring.

criterions.comment: node-negotiator package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
